SEARCH
Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.controller.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
Controller for the main UI. Manages user interaction with the menu, order creation, and coordination of customization popups for different menu items.
Author:
Yakelin Melendez-Gonzalez, Nivedha Sundar
